job_tasks.phrase: Jij gaat werken bij toonaangevende organisaties en bent verantwoordelijk voor geautomatiseerd testen volgens de hoogste standaarden.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes being responsible for automated testing, which involves building and maintaining test automation solutions, falling under software development principles for testing.

job_tasks.phrase: Je maakt gebruik van tools zoals Tosca, Playwright, Selenium en Robot Framework
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific automation tools like Playwright, Selenium, and Robot Framework directly relates to the development of test automation solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Je schrijft scripts, onderhoudt frameworks en breidt bestaande test-automation-oplossingen uit.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly details core software development activities related to test automation: scripting, maintaining frameworks, and extending solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij begrijpt de behoeften van de business, waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the requirement to understand business needs and act as a liaison, which is a core component of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: en duikt in de wereld van Agile en DevOps.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning Agile and DevOps indicates involvement in operational processes and methodologies for software development, which extends to testing operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Je gaat actief aan de slag met procesverbeteringen en bent betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.
job_tasks.justification: Engaging in process improvements and ensuring high quality involves understanding current processes (business context) and aiming for better outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
Je gaat actief aan de slag met procesverbeteringen
betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on test automation engineering using tools like Playwright and Selenium, which aligns more with traditional software quality assurance. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
